title: [solved]PPBUS_G3H low voltage 820-2850 not charging fixed via Q7055
message:
Hi Everybody

820-2850 is working with charger , shows battery and charging but its too slow ( in 40Min. %2 charged). When i checked voltage see PPBUS_G3H is 11.8 volt but must be 12.8V. Louis wrote few times 1or 2 volts is missing on PPBUS_G3H its cause from SMC but i want to ask again any where can i check before SMC? ( I checked R7051,R7052  and R7005 its fine)

title: [solved]PPBUS_G3H low voltage 820-2850 not charging fixed via Q7055
message: I guess is a bad battery try with a known good... What OS report about battery... "Replace Now", "Service Battery"??

title: [solved]PPBUS_G3H low voltage 820-2850 not charging fixed via Q7055
message: I tried known good  battery nothing changed:( OS report condition normal for battery.

title: [solved]PPBUS_G3H low voltage 820-2850 not charging fixed via Q7055
message: Could be a bad Q7055, did you run ASD, does it reports some sensor issue??

title: [solved]PPBUS_G3H low voltage 820-2850 not charging fixed via Q7055
[solved]PPBUS_G3H low voltage 820-2850 not charging fixed via Q7055
message: Thank you dukefawks ans aprendiz when i changed q7055 its working.
